entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Slave Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:01 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mist, -7.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Slave Lake Airport 8:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
Condition: Mist
Temperature: -7.0°C
Pressure: 102.1 kPa
Visibility: 3.6 km
Humidity: 96 %
Wind Chill: -14
Dewpoint: -7.5°C
Wind: E 21 km/h gust 32 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Fog patches. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Wednesday 11 January 2023
